mapper.sql: wipod.job_order_det_id, wipod.job_order_id, wipod.source_det_id, wipod.material_owner_id, wipod.warehouse_id, wipod.in_storage_id, wipod.out_storage_id, wipod.platform_id, wipod.inventory_status_id, wipod.material_id, wipod.packing_unit_name, wipod.plan_qty, wipod.distribution_qty, wipod.actual_qty, wipod.receiving_date, wipod.production_date, wipod.expired_date, wipod.work_start_time, wipod.work_end_time, wipod.batch_code, wipod.status, wipod.remark, wipod.org_id, wipod.create_user_id, wipod.create_time, wipod.modified_user_id, wipod.modified_time, wipod.is_delete, wipod.order_status, wipod.shift_storage_status
mapper.select: select material_id FROM eng_packing_order_summary_det where packing_order_summary_det_id=#{id}
